channel.title: Salt
channel.itunes:subtitle: Just adding a little salt to the world.
channel.itunes:author: JOVI
channel.itunes:summary: Messages and audiocasts from Salt around the world. Matthew 5:13 : We are the salt of the earth! This podcast is just sprinkling a little of the flavor of God to the world. This podcast shares messages from preachers and teachers around the world.
